article:
This is a 'list of [[Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection|WFC
compatible]] games on the [[Nintendo DS]] and [[Nintendo DSi]]' handheld game
consoles. These games are playable online out of the box, as long as the system
is in range of a properly-configured WiFi router or a Nintendo Wi-Fi USB
Connector, and are not to be confused with games that allow for multiple players
within a small radius.
